channel.title: [SOLVED] fingerprinting issues when changing desktop/windows appearance
channel.description:
Will i risk to break security if i change the desktop and windows appearance (for example the possibility of change the fingerprint of workstation)? Thank You for your work
Edit by Patrick: Changed subject.

item.title: [SOLVED] fingerprinting issues when changing desktop/windows appearance
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Depends on what settings. Desktops nowadays come with so many settings, it’s difficult to document them all. Changing desktop icons, desktop background however can’t be fingerprinted with any method I am aware of.

As for installing a whole different desktop environment, see:

Whonix – 31 Dec 19

Other Desktop Environments - Whonix

How to use Other Desktop Environments other than XFCE with Whonix ™. Current situation. Risks. Future.

Read full topic
item.source: [SOLVED] fingerprinting issues when changing desktop/windows appearance
